Regulation Name(s): Gene expression profiling test system for breast cancer prognosis
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Agendia MammaPrint gene expression profiling test system for breast cancer prognosis using microarray technology.
Indications for Use Summary: Qualitative in vitro diagnostic test service using gene expression profile of fresh breast cancer tissue samples to assess risk for distant metastasis in patients under 61 years, Stage I/II, tumor size ≤5.0 cm, lymph node negative, for prognostic use by physicians with other clinicopathological factors.
